full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
**Title (English)**: Training Simulator Administrator  
**Title (French)**: Administrateur du simulateur de formation  

**Reference number** : CB-765-59341336  
**Tender Reference number**: W6448-25-D004  

**Tender closing date**: 13 June 2024, 16:00:00  
**Publication date**: 24 May 2024  
**Expected Contract duration**: 1 October 2024 - 30 September 2029  

**Trade Agreements**:
The procurement falls under the following trade agreements:
• Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement
• Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement
• Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership
• Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
• Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
• Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
• Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement
• Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement
• Canadian Free Trade Agreement
• World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement
• Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement

**Procurement details**:

* Procurement category: SRV
* Procurement method: Competitive - Selective tendering
* Selection criteria: Lowest Price
* Regions of opportunity: Canada
* Regions of delivery: Ontario (except National Capital Region)

### Contact Information:

* Contact name: Dean Hiscock  
* Contact email: dean.hiscock@forces.gc.ca  
* Contact phone: 613-687-5511 
* Contact address:
	+ Address line 1: 285 Brindle Road
	+ City: Petawawa  
	+ Province: Ontario  
	+ Postal code: K8H 2X3  
	+ Country: Canada

### Document Access:
The tender notice and solicitation documents are available via the following links:

* English version: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/38155/rfp-w6448-25-d004-training-simulator-administrator-csor-petawawa.pdf
* French version: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/38155/rfp-fr-w6448-25-d004-training-simulator-administrator-csor-petawawa.pdf

### Tender Description:
The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for 2 Training Simulator Administrators to operate and maintain simulation equipment at Canadian Forces Base Petawawa. Only registered suppliers may
